PyLongQt Documentation¶

PyLongQt¶

Python bindings for LongQt, a cardiac cell electrophysiology simulation platform. This library allows for cell models to be created and configured to run both simple and complex simulations.

Note

Further documentation on LongQt and its graphical interface as well as sample code can be found in the LongQt manual
